abstract: In a barb-filled letter to shareholders on Monday, the billionaire wrote that he could not overcome a series of defeats, including changes to the voting rules that make it easier for Michael S. Dell and the investment firm Silver Lake to prevail in their bid to buy the company.
snippet: In a barb-filled letter to shareholders on Monday, the billionaire wrote that he could not overcome a series of defeats, including changes to the voting rules that make it easier for Michael S. Dell and the investment firm Silver Lake to prevail i...
lead_paragraph: After months of fighting and a seemingly inexhaustible stream of sharp-tongued letters, Carl C. Icahn is ending his battle against Dell’s proposed sale to its founder.

headline.main: Icahn Calls Off Fight Over Dell’s Sale

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
